MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Recap of Episode 2.
After defeating the kidnappers that were causing a ruckus in town, I heard about Leipzig's sad upbringing while we were talking.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ...By the way, Murmansk, do you want to eat something sweet?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Huh? Eh, what's with that sudden question? Like what?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, I'm sorry. I'm afraid I spoke too much which is not like me... It's not like me to talk so much. That's more for Ms. Superior Officer who love to talk more than eating.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: So I'd like to end this conversation, and I'd like to reward you as well, Murmansk. You did your best to cover me.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
What~? It that okay?
I'm happy just being with you like this, Zenzenman.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Don't say that. I will tell you one of Zenzenman's forty-seven secrets, just for you, Murmansk. You are my comrade in arms who has defeated evil with me.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What? Forty-seven secrets!? Only like seven are known and it's a huge topic among fans...those secrets? You're going to tell it just to me? Wow!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes. It's a setting that doesn't particularly relate to the main story, or rather the narrative, so it seems Ms. Superior Officer is putting off thinking about it... Well, the Hero of Justice needs to be mysterious, too.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
So exciting...! I'm so happy!
This is the best reward I've ever gotten~! I'm so excited♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Okay, now please pay attention to my morphing belt.
While being somehow left out of the flow of the conversation, I also look at Leipzig's waist. She has on a strangely shaped belt that has the character of Hero of Justice Zenzenman on it.
In the movies, Leipzig puts her hand on this belt and shouts "Morph!" and a huge explosion occur... Then, out of the light emerges Zenzenman in costume.

It's a flashy, cool touch. Of course, those are movies.
Her actual belt probably only functions to keep her clothes from slipping down.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, you would think so. But that's not true.
Don't tell me you can really morph...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
What do you think? Seeing is believing.
I'll show you through action, not words.
With a somewhat mischievous expression, Leipzig puts her hand on the transformation belt at her waist. A familiar song begins to flow from the belt at high volume.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Ah! This is the theme song from Zenzenman...!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, actually, this song was composed by me.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oh, really? The mysterious genius composer?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It was all me. I enjoy writing lyrics and music.
It's a little embarrassing...♪

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Anyway. While this music is playing,
if you make the morphing pose while wearing the belt―

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: ―Morph!
The belt around her waist emits a mechanical sound at the same time as Leipzig cries out with spunk. Immediately after, the belt unfolds like a door, and something appears from behind it.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: That's...!?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes, it's a rainbow-colored pearl that is said to be the source of power for Zenzenman. It's made inside the belt regularly, and when taken into the body, Zenzenman is able to display epic combat abilities.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: I know! That's why when the bad guys stole your belt, you couldn't change for a while and were in trouble! I was so frightened!
Leipzig presents a rainbow-colored pearl from her belt to an excited Murmansk. On closer inspection, it appears to be some kind of candy ball wrapped in a rainbow-colored sachet.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Look, it's Zenzenman Candy~♪
It's sweet and delicious!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Wow, Zenzenman candy! Nyum nyum! So sweet...♪
Murmansk tilts her head as she puts the candy ball in her mouth without hesitation.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
Huh? But can I really have this?
You can't morph without it, can you?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase:
It's no problem. The same thing will appear inside the belt again in a few days...
In reality, though, it needs to be refilled periodically and secretly by parents.
Ah, so it's a product.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: What? What do you mean?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Haha, It's the brainchild of Ms. Superior Officer... We are planning to release a Zenzenman morphing belt. The belt is designed to hold a candy bar inside.
In short, the belt is just a pretty fancy box of candy.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Murmansk
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Huh? So even if I eat this candy, I can't change into Zenzenman...?

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Nope. These candies are the fruit of Eisengrad's cutting-edge technology. The nutrients that children need to grow strong are concentrated in an easily digestible form.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Just lick this every day and you'll get stronger. It will increase the survival rate of children who live in poor nutritional conditions, especially in areas that are severely affected by Mist―even if it's just a little.
I see. So it's part of a kind of welfare or charity work.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Yes. By the way, both the belt itself and the candy that can be added to it are quite cheap. If we can get this into a lot of homes, there will be fewer children dying because they can't grow properly.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Some of these children may become heroes in the future. They don't have to wear strange and embarrassing costumes and shout out the names of special moves, but any child can be a hero if they want to be.

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: No. Anyone can morph, just like me.

Having said that, Leipzig suddenly looks around. Before we realize, there is a crowd of people gathering around... The local residents were evacuated during the battle with the traveling carnival, but they must have returned when the battle was over.

The crowd, especially the children, are looking at Leipzig with sparkling eyes.
There's Zenzenman! Our favorite Hero of Justice!

MSceneDetailViewModel.Name: Leipzig
MSceneDetailViewModel.Phrase: Oops. My true identity is a secret, so you can't call me by that name...♪

Putting her finger to her lips, Leipzig smiles gently.
The children respond with smiles and good cheer.
The former village girl is now a national hero loved by everyone.
